recategorizeReason: NO, this application is not correctly categorized since the contribution description uses first person pronouns ("i", "me"), which implies that the application is from an individual rather than a project.

pwFlaggedReason: This application should be flagged because it violates rule 1 promising future impact with the Early Bird campaign and also violates rule 6 by promoting a token sale ($NYM prize pool).
